Package org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class OldFSACodec

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.OldAutomatonCodec
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.OldFSACodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
public class OldFSACodec
extends OldAutomatonCodec
An FSACodec can encode a finite state automaton in old GOAL file format (GFF) and decode an old GFF file back to a finite state automaton. This codec is part of GFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

      Overrides:

      Returns:
